name: sink
description: Sink is a self-hosted URL shortener and redirection service. It offers basic analytics, custom slugs, and a modern simple UI for managing links.
features: URL shortening: Creates short links with custom or random slugs.
Click analytics: Tracks total clicks, unique visitors, and referrer sources.
Custom slugs: Allows personalized short link paths for branding.
Link expiration: Sets automatic expiration dates for temporary links.
QR codes: Generates QR codes for each shortened URL.
API access: Provides REST API for programmatic link creation and management.
Simple interface: Manages links through clean, minimal web UI.
No registration: Creates links without requiring user accounts.
Link editing: Updates destination URLs without changing the short link.
Statistics dashboard: Displays click trends and geographic distribution.
Bulk operations: Creates or manages multiple links simultaneously.
Export data: Downloads link statistics and history for analysis.
